reviews.review: Excellent petit jeu. Se finit en 2-3h max.
SuperB
q pro es el juego

Great game, but the main storyline is REALLY SHORT.

Once you finish the story new challenge levels (6) are unlocked, but honestly... I don't think I'm ever gonna give them a try.

The puzzles in each test really get your brain going, also i'm working on the transmission achievement and because there is no description its hard to do you need to really think hard. If you like that kinda stuff then this game is for you. A big happy meal with lots puzzles. And a big plot twist with GlaDOS! I really recommend playing!

Sooo long story short: i've played the portal 2 first, after quite sometime im playing this one. This game mainstory is very short üò≥ , to be honest i had a motionsickness while playing this LoL.. but i enjoyed this game. 

The puzzle is more difficult than Portal 2, and less story to tell than the amazing-more fun-puzzlesolving sequel. 

I give it: 8/ 10

Win 10 64 bit
Core i7 8700k 
32gb ram ddr4
Radeon RX 6900XT 16gb

This game is a great gateway to gaming, a person who doesn't understand games will be able to pick up games playing this game.
I found the experience of this great and a one everyone should have along with the second game.
I enjoyed this game so much, but I ain't gonna finish the achievements unless I'm bored, as my heart goes to the second game more then this one.
It's too short for the price, luckily I bought it for 2 dollars when it was on sale.
Anyway, enjoy your day!

Despite being outdone by its sequel, I still believe the original Portal is a worthwhile, short first-person puzzle game that will forever be seen as a staple of the genre that anyone who plays games should try at least once.
Still worth playing over a decade later.
What more can be said about this classic game? It's a must-play.

Desde que possuo steam (2013) nunca tive tanto interesse por esse jogo que todos falavam ser incr√≠vel, estou arrependido de ter demorado tanto? com certeza. A engine da valve √© t√£o incr√≠vel que permite tantos mods bons serem feitos e com certeza Portal √© o mais fora da caixa. 
>>>Visual: O jogo possui gr√°ficos bem bonitos at√© hoje, a f√≠sica que com certeza √© o foco se sobressai.
>>>Dificuldade: Os puzzles v√£o do bem simples at√© alguns um pouco mais dif√≠ceis, por√©m nada que demande varias horas. 
>>>Intera√ß√£o: A comunica√ß√£o com a rob√¥ √© um ponto muito positivo j√° que ela √© estranhamente bem humorada ao mesmo tempo que passa seriedade e sarcasmo.
>>>Historia por tr√°s: Se cria um interesse ao longo do jogo pelo mist√©rio envolvendo a empresa buscar volunt√°rios cobaias, criar maquinas perigosas, entre outras coisas.
>>>Tempo de jogo: demorei 3 horas separadas em 2 dias, o que me agradou e ao mesmo tempo me fez querer mais, por isso digo que √© o √∫nico ponto negativo (mas sabendo que portal 2 melhorou isso 10x talvez releve)
